languages.text: {n}Монтэг с язвительной улыбкой выдувает струю дыма в сторону Мастера дисциплины.{/n} "Вот так поворот, Иокаста. Инфернусы, оказывается, невиновны! Выходит, ты зря моих людей била и унижала?"

{n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"
languages.original_text: {n}Монтэг с язвительной улыбкой выдувает струю дыма в сторону Мастера дисциплины.{/n} "Вот так поворот, Иокаста. Инфернусы, оказывается, невиновны! Выходит, ты зря моих людей била и унижала?"

traits.locale_text: {n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

{n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

{n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

{n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

{n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

{n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

{n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

languages.text: {n}Einrich esboza una sonrisa mordaz y sopla el humo en dirección a Sauerback.{/n} «Menudo giro de los acontecimientos, Jocasta. ¡Los infernus eran inocentes! ¿Quién se lo hubiera imaginado? ¿Será que se equivocó al humillar y maltratar a los míos?».
languages.original_text: {n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich esboza una sonrisa mordaz y sopla el humo en dirección a Sauerback.{/n} «Menudo giro de los acontecimientos, Jocasta. ¡Los infernus eran inocentes! ¿Quién se lo hubiera imaginado? ¿Será que se equivocó al humillar y maltratar a los míos?».

languages.text: {n}トゲを感じる笑みを浮かべて、アインリッヒはザウアーバックの方へ煙を吐き出した。{/n}「とんだドンデン返しだな、ジョカスタ。インフェルニは無実だ！誰が予想できた？君が俺の仲間達に惨たらしい屈辱を与えたのは間違いだったのではないかな？」
languages.original_text: {n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

traits.locale_text: {n}トゲを感じる笑みを浮かべて、アインリッヒはザウアーバックの方へ煙を吐き出した。{/n}「とんだドンデン返しだな、ジョカスタ。インフェルニは無実だ！誰が予想できた？君が俺の仲間達に惨たらしい屈辱を与えたのは間違いだったのではないかな？」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇脸上带着尖酸的微笑，朝苏尔贝克的方向吐了口麻烟。{/n}“这样的情况真是太让人震惊了，约卡斯塔！控火行会的人居然是无辜的！谁能想象到居然会这样呢？你当初虐待、羞辱我的族人的时候，会不会其实是你做错了？”
languages.original_text: {n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇脸上带着尖酸的微笑，朝苏尔贝克的方向吐了口麻烟。{/n}“这样的情况真是太让人震惊了，约卡斯塔！控火行会的人居然是无辜的！谁能想象到居然会这样呢？你当初虐待、羞辱我的族人的时候，会不会其实是你做错了？”

languages.text: {n}Mit einem bitteren Lächeln bläst Einrich eine Rauchwolke in Sauerbacks Richtung.{/n} "Was für eine schockierende Wendung, Jocasta. Die Inferni sind unschuldig! Wer hätte das ahnen können? Wäre es am Ende möglich, dass es falsch von Euch war, meine Leute zu demütigen?"
languages.original_text: {n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem bitteren Lächeln bläst Einrich eine Rauchwolke in Sauerbacks Richtung.{/n} "Was für eine schockierende Wendung, Jocasta. Die Inferni sind unschuldig! Wer hätte das ahnen können? Wäre es am Ende möglich, dass es falsch von Euch war, meine Leute zu demütigen?"

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire acerbe, Einrich exhale un nuage de fumée en direction de Sauerback.{/n} « En voilà, un étrange retournement de situation, n'est-ce pas, Jocasta ? Les inferni sont innocents ! Ça alors, qui l'eût cru ? Se pourrait-il que vous ayez eu tort de brutaliser et d'humilier les miens ? »
languages.original_text: {n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire acerbe, Einrich exhale un nuage de fumée en direction de Sauerback.{/n} « En voilà, un étrange retournement de situation, n'est-ce pas, Jocasta ? Les inferni sont innocents ! Ça alors, qui l'eût cru ? Se pourrait-il que vous ayez eu tort de brutaliser et d'humilier les miens ? »

languages.text: {n}Einrich, acı bir gülümsemeyle Sauerback'in bulunduğu yöne doğru yoğun bir duman üflüyor.{/n} "Olaylar ne kadar da şaşırtıcı bir şekilde gelişti Jocasta. İtfacılar masummuş! Bunu kim tahmin edebilirdi? Emrimdekileri zorbalayıp aşağılamakla hata etmiş olabilir misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}With an acerbic smile, Einrich blows a stream of smoke in Sauerback's direction.{/n} "What a shocking turn of events, Jocasta. The inferni are innocent! Who could have seen that coming? Could it be that you were wrong to brutalise and humiliate my people?"
